snippet.title: Kentum - Official Announcement Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Watch the announcement trailer for Kentum, a 2D action-adventure game developed by TLON Industries. Players will platform across a wasteland scavenging for parts to survive and enhance the Base to continue the journey, Kentum is launching in 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
